content: immerse yourself in the cozy charm of the farmhouse bowl cozy crochet pattern this advanced beginner project combines seamless construction with a bottom-up approach creating a practical and stylish addition to your kitchen essentials worked in the round and detailed with a written pattern this cozy is perfect for crocheters looking to enhance their skills the farmhouse bowl cozy pattern offers a delightful challenge while producing a functional and decorative piece for your home **unique features-** seamless construction for a polished finish bottom-up sturdy construction creates a piece you ll use for years to come written pattern for clear and concise instructions machine washable and dryable make a set for the perfect housewarming or holiday gift **materials needed-** hook 5 5mm us size 9 0 yarn lily sugar n cream solids https //amzn to/3iv021u worsted weight 100-150 yards this pattern was originally available exclusively as part of stash busting quickies volume 3 and is now available as a stand-alone pdf or free on the blog
